title: Typographic Assignment
content:
The task was to choose a historical event and give it some type of context. I chose The Invention of the Alphabet. Any thoughts on how this is going?   
   
Thanks. SP   
   
 ![Alphabet Invention Assignment](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020160302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/42486.gif)
author: vestanpance

comments.content:
It's a lovely poster, but it does little to visually suggest the invention of the alphabet--I would dig a little deeper in the history books. What kind of graphic forms contributed to the invention of the alphabet?   
   
-Addison
I'll second that. It's very nice but I don't see the history. Also, I don't think there is any such thing as "the invention of the alphabet." It was a long evolution.
